title: A Very Mafia Christmas
description: "Marry me.""What?" My gaze widens, "What did you say?""Marry me," His lips curl, "not for real, of course..."Christian Roberto Dominico Sovrano could have any woman he wants but he's totally focused on me.He's obsessed with me.He lives to make my life miserable.It's why he asked me to pose as his fake wife for 60 days.SIXTY days!In return for saving my life from the wrath of the Mafia.Oh! He also wants me to attend his family's Christmas getaway.Where I have to share his room.And his bed!And pretend to be his loving devoted spouse *gulp*It's not like I have a choice.But hell if I am going to simply agree to his terms.I plan to go toe-to-toe with him.And make him pay for this sham of a marriage that he's locked me in.Only he's tall, hot, and oh! So wickedly mean.And when he looks at me with his piercing gaze.I am sure he can see right through me.It's why I need to leave.Before he finds out my secret...A firecracker of a doctor takes on a big bad Mafia lawyer, in this Christmas Romance which will leave you asking for more! 1-ClickÂ NOWLaxmi's note: This is Aurora & Christian's story.Michael and Karma's story continues in this book.
author: L. Steele
